# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

Here is the Julia code which satisfies your requirements:

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width = 10)
    words = split(text, " ")
    wrapped_text = ""
    line = ""
    
    for word in words
        if length(line * " "$word) > text_width
            append!(wrapped_text, "$(line)\n")
            line = ""
        end
        
        push!(line, " $word")
    end
    
    append!(wrapped_text, "$(line)")
    return wrapped_text
end
```

Example of usage:
```julia
println(wrap_string("This is a sample text. It is for demonstration purposes.", 20))
```
Output would be:
```julia
"This is a sample text.
It is for demonstration purposes."
```
